title: Pork loin chops with apples, cider and creamy butter bean mash
description: Give free-range British pork the treatment it deserves with this indulgent cream and apple sauce from The Hairy Bikers.
ingredients: 2 pork loin chops, preferably British and free-range
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 English eating apple, cored and cut into wedges
1 x 400g/14oz can butter beans, drained and rinsed
small bunch spinach, washed and drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper
